author: dougm
msg: - return value from apr_dir_read() was checking != APR_SUCCESS rather
than == APR_SUCCESS, so no certs were ever loaded.
- wasn't checking return value of apr_dir_open(), now log an error and
- don't bother trying to load directories

author: dougm
msg: plug leak in ssl_init_FindCAList() where return value of
X509_NAME_oneline() used for trace logging was not freed.
now passes in a static buffer so no buffer is malloced.

author: dougm
msg: fold some duplication within ssl_init_FindCAList() into generic

author: dougm
msg: subset of pkg.sslcfg/ca-bundle.crt for testing SSLCACertficatePath
